Reviews.Title: Very frustrating.
Reviews.Author: Avid Rider
Reviews.Content: The picture is not bad, but the remote is virtually useless.  I cannot be more than 3ft. from the tv and I have to point it directly at the IR eye on the TV.  The functionality is also limited at best.  It also has issues with reading several brand new dvd's.

Reviews.Title: affinity led
Reviews.Author: jim king
Reviews.Content: the affinity led is not like i expected.... one item stand out and that is the picture. for a led ,the tv doesn't produce a picture like anled should.  so more like an lcd....  i expected the picture to be sharper , and is not.all the other aspects are ok.my samsung has a sharper picture, the affinity is dull.

Reviews.Title: Happily Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Paw Paw
Reviews.Content: The remote was a bit hard & uncomfortable to my hand, but overall it is a nice efficient  affordable TV.

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: J Man
Reviews.Content: The picture is good enough, but the sound is horrible.  It sounds like the speakers are in a tin can.  I would definitely keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Yuck...
Reviews.Author: John A. Armstrong "UtahMediaJunkie"
Reviews.Content: We got this refurbished from Tiger Direct. It came without a remote so we had no experience watching shows... You cannot watch anything or use it without the remote. Tiger Direct was wonderful and offered to ship a $60 universal remote to help out. We turned it down and returned it. Really flat panel TV tech has come a long way in 5 or so years... This will take you back to 2004-08 vintage flat panel tech... I say buy something open box and newer if you want a killer deal. This is not one at any price...
